main event: A sighting of a blue-white disc shaped object off the coast of Okinawa on October 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for ten seconds and had a tremendous rate of speed., The object seemed to disappear as though going into a fit with no sound or trail., The sighting was made without any aircraft or other balls in the vicinity., The course of the object was noted as 32 to NW., The conclusion suggested it might be a meteor.
